display.title: Current Study Requirements - Master Wizard
display.description: You are a master of arcane research and power. You have a vast collection of tomes of knowledge, samples from far-off places, items of power, and magical apparatus, which you use to recharge your power and increase your knowledge. You require 100 bookshelves, 5 enchanting tables, 20 brewing stands, 10 lecterns, 100 blocks of amethyst, 30 glowstone, 30 quartz, 50 lapis blocks, 20 end stone, 20 purpur, 3 end crystals, 10 crimson wood blocks, 10 warped wood blocks, 20 soul sand, 5 soul fires (or torches, lanterns, or campfires), 20 gold blocks, 20 obsidian, 5 sculk sensors, a sculk shrieker, 20 sculk, 3 sculk catalysts, 1 netherite block, 5 diamond blocks, 1 dragon egg, 1 dragon head.
